snippet: Mardy Fish withdrew from the U.S. Open because of his latest health scare. He has had a traumatic season, missing multiple tournaments because of an accelerated heartbeat.
abstract: Mardy Fish withdraws from the United States Open due to health concerns before his scheduled fourth-round match against Roger Federer.
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish withdrew from the U.S. Open because of his latest health scare. He has had a traumatic season, missing multiple tournaments because of an accelerated heartbeat.

headline.seo: Mardy Fish Withdraws From U.S. Open Because of Health Scare
headline.main: Health Issue Leads Fish to Withdraw Before Federer Match
headline.print_headline: Health Issue Leads Fish to Withdraw Before Federer Match
